Pattern Library

biography card

< back to style guide

RULES & DEPENDENCIES:

This component will have fields for:

  • layout - can be vertical or horizontal (optional, vertical by default)
  • image (optional)
  • altText (optional but recommended if an image is provided)
  • name (optional)
  • title (optional)
  • cta (optional)
  • link (optional)
  • hasTextLink - include this if you want the cta to be a text link and not a button (optional, false by default)
SLOTS:
  • bio (optional)

President, Google.com, Seattle
